customize_name_description: Choose the username that this app will post as.
customize_icon_description: Choose the icon that is used for messages from this app.
customize_postto_recentlyadded_descripti: Channel (or Username) to post Recently Added content to.
customize_postto_plexupdates_description: Channel (or Username) to post Plex Updates content to.
customize_postto_tautulliupdates_descrip: Channel (or Username) to post Tautulli Updates content to.
slashcommand_recentlyaddedkeywords_descr: Add a keyword to trigger notifications on Recently Added media (if using list option, no keyword is needed, and all will be displayed)
